Enum ConnectionState

java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ConnectionState>
public enum ConnectionState
extends java.lang.Enum<ConnectionState>

Enumeration of the states of a connection.

Author:
Jerome Louvel

Enum Constant Summary
CLOSED
          The network connection has been successfully closed.
CLOSING
          The network connection will be close as soon as the pending pending response is sent.
OPEN
          The network connection has been successfully opened.
OPENING
          The network connection is being opened.

The network connection is being opened.

The network connection has been successfully opened.

The network connection will be close as soon as the pending pending response is sent.
